example_sentence_italian: Devo mettere il libro sul tavolo.
example_sentence_english: I must put the book on the table.

example_sentence_italian: Sto mettendo il libro sul tavolo.
example_sentence_english: I am putting the book on the table.

notes: used with auxiliary 'avere' to form compound tenses
example_sentence_italian: La torta è messa sul tavolo.
example_sentence_english: The cake is placed on the table.

notes: used with auxiliary 'avere' to form compound tenses
example_sentence_italian: Le tazze sono messe sul ripiano.
example_sentence_english: The cups are placed on the shelf.

notes: used with auxiliary 'avere' to form compound tenses
example_sentence_italian: I libri sono messi nello zaino.
example_sentence_english: The books are put in the backpack.

notes: used with auxiliary 'avere' to form compound tenses
example_sentence_italian: Il pacco è messo qui.
example_sentence_english: The package is placed here.

example_sentence_italian: Io metto il sale nella zuppa.
example_sentence_english: I put salt in the soup.

example_sentence_italian: Tu metti le chiavi sul tavolo.
example_sentence_english: You put the keys on the table.

example_sentence_italian: Lui mette il piatto in lavastoviglie.
example_sentence_english: He puts the plate in the dishwasher.

example_sentence_italian: Noi mettiamo i vestiti nell'armadio.
example_sentence_english: We put the clothes in the wardrobe.

example_sentence_italian: Voi mettete i bicchieri sul tavolo.
example_sentence_english: You (plural) put the glasses on the table.

example_sentence_italian: Loro mettono i bambini a letto.
example_sentence_english: They put the children to bed.

example_sentence_italian: Io mettevo sempre zucchero nel caffè.
example_sentence_english: I used to put sugar in coffee.

example_sentence_italian: Tu mettevi troppo sale.
example_sentence_english: You used to put too much salt.

example_sentence_italian: Lui metteva le chiavi qui ogni sera.
example_sentence_english: He used to put the keys here every evening.

example_sentence_italian: Noi mettevamo da parte i soldi.
example_sentence_english: We used to put aside money.

example_sentence_italian: Voi mettevate sempre i piatti nello stesso posto.
example_sentence_english: You (plural) used to always put the plates in the same place.

example_sentence_italian: Loro mettevano i libri sulla scrivania.
example_sentence_english: They used to put the books on the desk.

notes: used with auxiliary 'avere' to form compound tenses; no agreement with subject
example_sentence_italian: Ho messo la torta nel forno.
example_sentence_english: I have put the cake in the oven.

notes: used with auxiliary 'avere' to form compound tenses; no agreement with subject
example_sentence_italian: Ho messo i libri nello zaino.
example_sentence_english: I have put the books in the backpack.

notes: used with auxiliary 'avere' to form compound tenses; no agreement with subject
example_sentence_italian: Hai messo la chiave sul tavolo.
example_sentence_english: You have put the key on the table.

notes: used with auxiliary 'avere' to form compound tenses; no agreement with subject
example_sentence_italian: Hai messo il telefono nella borsa.
example_sentence_english: You have put the phone in the bag.

translation_english: she/he has put / he/she has put
notes: used with auxiliary 'avere' to form compound tenses; no agreement with subject; also 'you (formal)'
example_sentence_italian: Ha messo la giacca sullo sgabello.
example_sentence_english: She has put the jacket on the stool.

translation_english: she/he has put / he/she has put
notes: used with auxiliary 'avere' to form compound tenses; no agreement with subject; also 'you (formal)'
example_sentence_italian: Ha messo il piatto nella credenza.
example_sentence_english: He has put the plate in the cupboard.

notes: used with auxiliary 'avere' to form compound tenses; no agreement with subject
example_sentence_italian: Abbiamo messo le tagliatelle a cuocere.
example_sentence_english: We have put the tagliatelle to cook.

notes: used with auxiliary 'avere' to form compound tenses; no agreement with subject
example_sentence_italian: Abbiamo messo i piatti sul tavolo.
example_sentence_english: We have put the plates on the table.

notes: used with auxiliary 'avere' to form compound tenses; no agreement with subject
example_sentence_italian: Avete messo le chiavi nella borsa.
example_sentence_english: You (plural) have put the keys in the bag.

notes: used with auxiliary 'avere' to form compound tenses; no agreement with subject
example_sentence_italian: Avete messo i piatti nella mensa.
example_sentence_english: You (plural) have put the plates in the cafeteria.

notes: used with auxiliary 'avere' to form compound tenses; no agreement with subject
example_sentence_italian: Hanno messo le borse in macchina.
example_sentence_english: They have put the bags in the car.

notes: used with auxiliary 'avere' to form compound tenses; no agreement with subject
example_sentence_italian: Hanno messo i vestiti nell'armadio.
